name: Lava Frog (mathgeek656)
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 49 Compo.

Theme: Unstable

Game is about a frog in a volcano, jumping across unstable platforms. Click near the frog to get it to jump to your mouse, and guide the frog to the end of the level. Don't fall in the lava!

If the dimensions are too large, alt + f4 to quit the program

Made in python with pygame.

The music is horror because the developer doesn't know how to create music.

Sprites (lava, platform, and frog) created with pixilart.com
